## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary">DynamicLibrary</a></>}>
This class provides a portable interface to dynamic libraries which also might be known as shared libraries, shared objects, dynamic shared objects, or dynamic link libraries. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class provides a portable interface to dynamic libraries which also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// might be known as shared libraries, shared objects, dynamic shared</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// objects, or dynamic link libraries. Regardless of the terminology or the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operating system interface, this class provides a portable interface that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// allows dynamic libraries to be loaded and searched for externally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// defined symbols. This is typically used to provide &quot;plug-in&quot; support.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It also allows for symbols to be defined which don&#39;t live in any library,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// but rather the main program itself, useful on Windows where the main</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// executable cannot be searched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a57f3eea5ad36a6b82ec5bb2b63363227">DynamicLibrary</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Placeholder whose address represents an invalid library.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use this instead of NULL or a pointer-int pair because the OS library</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// might define 0 or 1 to be &quot;special&quot; handles, such as &quot;search all&quot;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Searches through the library for the symbol \\p symbolName. If it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// found, the address of that symbol is returned. If not, NULL is returned.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Use isValid() to distinguish these cases if it is important.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// SO&#95;LoadOrder - Or this in to search libraries in the ordered loaded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The default bahaviour is to search loaded libraries in reverse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a5e198e8003db7c5e9f35ee98a5897e59a766335f02cb77f4bea92f2212f65c0b5"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a5e198e8003db7c5e9f35ee98a5897e59a766335f02cb77f4bea92f2212f65c0b5">SO&#95;LoadOrder</a> = 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a796ad78100654a505c1803a39208fb5d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a5e198e8003db7c5e9f35ee98a5897e59">SearchOrdering</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a796ad78100654a505c1803a39208fb5d">SearchOrder</a>; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// = SO&#95;Linker</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function will search through all previously loaded dynamic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// libraries for the symbol \\p symbolName. If it is found, the address of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that symbol is returned. If not, null is returned. Note that this will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// search permanently loaded libraries (getPermanentLibrary()) as well</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// as explicitly registered symbols (AddSymbol()).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @throws std::string on error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Search through libraries for address of a symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#ae003d16a33e81b88943d3e3aa179fcc4">SearchForAddressOfSymbol</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;symbolName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Convenience function for C++ophiles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a5d4956a5c03696b5bb8230f61deb8061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a5d4956a5c03696b5bb8230f61deb8061">SearchForAddressOfSymbol</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string &amp;symbolName) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#ae003d16a33e81b88943d3e3aa179fcc4">SearchForAddressOfSymbol</a>(symbolName.c&#95;str());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This functions permanently adds the symbol \\p symbolName with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// value \\p symbolValue.  These symbols are searched before any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// libraries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add searchable symbol/value pair.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary/#a2f997f2beb9cf206cd215663be3b9617">AddSymbol</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> symbolName, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;symbolValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">HandleSet;</span></CodeLine>
